alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stone, northeastern Searcy, Izard, southeastern Marion, Fulton and Baxter Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Advance, or 11 miles south of Mountain Home, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Melbourne... Salem in Fulton County... Horseshoe Bend... Gassville... Calico Rock... Lakeview in Baxter County... Oxford... Norfork... Salesville... Mount Pleasant... Viola... Pineville... Briarcliff... Franklin... Arkawana... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone
